Name: Siienaa
About the game: Siienaa is an immersive VR experience that allows audiences to encounter a beautiful desert world comprising serene locations, inhabited with dramatic creatures. Siienaa has been created to offer a believable world with each location exposing different landscapes and inhabitants, while being striking and expansive. Fly through five varied, dramatic locations and explore another four, each with its own distinctive feel. Siienaa has been created to be a beautiful experience where you can relax and enjoy the environment that you find yourself in.
